column1: The family will receive friends and relatives from 9:00 AM until 11:00 AM Saturday
column3: 2015 at Taylor Bros. Funeral Home. Funeral service will begin at 11:00 AM with Rev. Lee Watson officiating. Interment will follow at Hawley Cemetery. Pallbearers will be Jeffrey Havel
column7: Tony Di Stasi and Todd Reynolds. Honorary pallbearers will be David Layton and Tony Di Stasi.
